preparation: Cook pasta. In a separate pan, cook beef until browned. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Combine with pasta.
Cook vegetables until tender. Add curry powder and seasoning.

ingredients: Flour, Cocoa Powder, Sugar, Eggs, Butter
preparation: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs and butter. Bake at 180C for 25 mins.
serving: Serve with a dollop of ice cream

ingredients: Pickle, Lettuce, Mayo, Chicken Breast, Bun
preparation: Go to Mary Brown's (preferably on Monday!) and eat a delicious chicken sandwich.
serving: Serve hot and fresh or warm up in Air Fryer for best results.
